data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Enga, Papua New Guinea to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 332,674 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Enga, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Enga, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Enga will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 332,674 lost in Enga that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, English-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Enga, Papua New Guinea from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 99,326 believers in the state of Enga the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Enga to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Enga
location.people_groups_list: Kanum, Enkelembu, Ninggera, Negira, Waibuk, Wanap, Iteri
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kanum, Enkelembu (400), Ninggera, Negira (200), Waibuk (3,400), Wanap (1,700), Iteri (800)
